Name: GUN&DUN
About the game: You play as a gun.... no, not a character with a gun, AS a gun. Lots of different types of enemies will attack you as you play along and as you uncover a huge secret. With different settings and re-playability, you can change up how the game is played and beat your high score! Features Difficulty levels. Choose from four different difficulties ranging from easy to impossible, and see which of those high scores can you beat! Gun colors. As you play along and get large high scores, you will start to unlock different gun colors that you can show off to your friends whoa aren't as good ad you. Power-ups. After killing an enemy, there is a chance of it dropping a power-up that you can utilize in order to increase your likelihood of surviving. Secret fight. If you are clever enough, you can uncover the secret of GUN&DUN and find out who is doing all of this. 6 completely original songs. 6 songs that you can bounce to and enjoy.
